channel.title: An item giving double xp
channel.description:
I'd love to make an option for donators to be able to donate for a ring or gloves that gives you 2x xp on every hit whilst training... How would I go about doing this?
Also I need to make a Ring of 2x PKP.
PI Base <- Project Insanity
Making the rings isnt a problem, adding the effect I wanted is what I need help with.

item.title: An item giving double xp
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

[quote=“oldskoolpk, post:16, topic:407052”][quote author=imsuperman05 link=topic=508348.msg3687823#msg3687823 date=1311952927]

Oh that’s good, that’s real great, oh he needs help lets just post anything and hope it works, without even caring if your actually helping them with there problem, and WE rushed to help him? You posted before us…

umadbro
[/quote]

First, you post a completely ‘guessed’ code. Then you call people “rep hungry”. You’re clever.
P0sesed soul is probably 5x more experienced then you. So quit speak non-sense and quit being a hypocrite.[/quote]
First, gtfo, 2nd, idc, 3rd, umadbro, 4th, idc, 5th, idc, 6th, i still don’t care because you do not know me, so you do now know if i am experienced or not.

item.title: An item giving double xp
item.dc:creator: @nL1 nL
item.description:
@nL1 wrote:

[quote=“p0sesed s0ul, post:6, topic:407052”]Open up your players folder and go into playerAssistant.java and search for

and where it sais

change that too

if (c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] == ####) { c.playerXP[skill] += amount * 2; } else c.playerXP[skill] += amount;

but make sure you change the #### to the item id and doesn’t have to be playerWeapon,
btw, this will make it for all skills, not just combat

this way is easier than imsuperman (don’t take that offensivly, it just really is )[/quote]

why did u add the ‘playerweapon’ int i just realized it… its not even a weapon, its a ring.

Read full topic

item.title: An item giving double xp
item.dc:creator: @p0sesed_s0ul p0sesed s0ul
item.description:
@p0sesed_s0ul wrote:

Open up your players folder and go into playerAssistant.java and search for

and where it sais

change that too

if (c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] == ####) { c.playerXP[skill] += amount * 2; } else c.playerXP[skill] += amount;

but make sure you change the #### to the item id and doesn’t have to be playerWeapon,
btw, this will make it for all skills, not just combat

this way is easier than imsuperman (don’t take that offensivly, it just really is )

Read full topic

item.title: An item giving double xp
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

CombatAssistant.java Don’t know if this’ll work, but give it a shot.

if (c.getItems().playerHasItem(ITEM_ID,1)) { c.getPA().addSkillXP((damage*Config.MELEE_EXP_RATE/6), 0); c.getPA().addSkillXP((damage*Config.MELEE_EXP_RATE/6), 1); c.getPA().addSkillXP((damage*Config.MELEE_EXP_RATE/6), 2); c.getPA().addSkillXP((damage*Config.MELEE_EXP_RATE/6), 3); c.getPA().refreshSkill(0); c.getPA().refreshSkill(1); c.getPA().refreshSkill(2); c.getPA().refreshSkill(3); } else { c.getPA().addSkillXP((damage*Config.MELEE_EXP_RATE/3), 0); c.getPA().addSkillXP((damage*Config.MELEE_EXP_RATE/3), 1); c.getPA().addSkillXP((damage*Config.MELEE_EXP_RATE/3), 2); c.getPA().addSkillXP((damage*Config.MELEE_EXP_RATE/3), 3); c.getPA().refreshSkill(0); c.getPA().refreshSkill(1); c.getPA().refreshSkill(2); c.getPA().refreshSkill(3); }

Read full topic
